column5: We haven't heard from you in a while, how's the recovery going, is you other bud home yet??  I hope everything is going smoothly and you're not getting worn out trying to keep the pup quiet  Maureen
Been thinking the same thing too.  I truely hope Jack's recovery from surgery is going very well.
Curious to know as well as my yellow lab is going in for a similar surgery this Wednesday.
HG - Hope you buddy's surgery and recovery are complete and 1000% successful.
